A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think this might be the worst Star Wars film yet and that's saying a lot. I watched it when it was released on bluray. I hated it. I hate how they do not respect anything from Star War history. I hate the obviously flawed fight sequences. I could go on but it's a terrible Star Wars movie. At best it is a mediocre space action flick but considering the bad fight sequences even that might be pushing it.
